channel.title: üè¢ Beihang University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Beihang University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: 4Diffusion: Multi-view Video Diffusion Model for 4D Generation
item.description: 4Diffusion generates high-quality, temporally consistent 4D content from monocular videos using a unified multi-view diffusion model and novel loss functions.

item.title: BiDM: Pushing the Limit of Quantization for Diffusion Models
item.description: BiDM achieves full 1-bit quantization in diffusion models, significantly improving storage and speed without sacrificing image quality, setting a new state-of-the-art.

item.title: Block Sparse Bayesian Learning: A Diversified Scheme
item.description: Diversified Block Sparse Bayesian Learning (DivSBL) improves block sparse signal recovery by adapting to unknown block structures, enhancing accuracy and robustness over existing methods.

item.title: CLIP in Mirror: Disentangling text from visual images through reflection
item.description: MirrorCLIP disentangles text from images in CLIP using mirror reflection differences, enhancing robustness against text-visual image confusion.

item.title: Dual Defense: Enhancing Privacy and Mitigating Poisoning Attacks in Federated Learning
item.description: Dual Defense Federated Learning (DDFed) simultaneously boosts privacy and thwarts poisoning attacks in federated learning without altering the existing framework.

item.title: Enhancing Graph Transformers with Hierarchical Distance Structural Encoding
item.description: Hierarchical Distance Structural Encoding (HDSE) empowers graph transformers to better capture hierarchical graph structures, leading to improved performance in graph classification and regression tas…

item.title: Exploring Structured Semantic Priors Underlying Diffusion Score for Test-time Adaptation
item.description: DUSA:Unlocking Diffusion Models’ Discriminative Power for Efficient Test-Time Adaptation

item.title: From Text to Trajectory: Exploring Complex Constraint Representation and Decomposition in Safe Reinforcement Learning
item.description: TTCT translates natural language constraints into effective training signals for safe reinforcement learning, enabling agents to learn safer policies with lower violation rates and zero-shot transfer …

item.title: How to Use Diffusion Priors under Sparse Views?
item.description: Inline Prior Guided Score Matching (IPSM) improves sparse-view 3D reconstruction by leveraging visual inline priors from pose relationships to rectify rendered image distribution and effectively guide…

item.title: LLMs as Zero-shot Graph Learners: Alignment of GNN Representations with LLM Token Embeddings
item.description: TEA-GLM leverages LLMs for zero-shot graph learning by aligning GNN representations with LLM token embeddings, achieving state-of-the-art performance on unseen datasets and tasks.

item.title: Long-Tailed Out-of-Distribution Detection via Normalized Outlier Distribution Adaptation
item.description: AdaptOD: a novel approach for robust OOD detection in long-tailed recognition, dynamically adapting outlier distributions to true OOD distributions using a dual-normalized energy loss for improved acc…

item.title: QUEST: Quadruple Multimodal Contrastive Learning with Constraints and Self-Penalization
item.description: QUEST: Quadruple Multimodal Contrastive Learning tackles feature suppression by using quaternion embedding to extract unique information while penalizing excessive shared information influence, achiev…

item.title: Uncovering the Redundancy in Graph Self-supervised Learning Models
item.description: Graph self-supervised learning models surprisingly exhibit high redundancy, allowing for significant parameter reduction without performance loss. A novel framework, SLIDE, leverages this discovery f…

item.title: Why Go Full? Elevating Federated Learning Through Partial Network Updates
item.description: FedPart boosts federated learning by updating only parts of the network, solving the layer mismatch problem, and achieving faster convergence with higher accuracy.
